name: 1v1 Duel
description: One-on-one competitive mode. Show your individual skills in intense 1v1 matches.

name: 2v2 Doubles
description: Two versus two competitive mode. Coordinate with your teammate to dominate the field.

name: 3v3 Standard
description: Three versus three competitive mode. The classic Rocket League experience.

name: 4v4 Chaos
description: Four versus four casual mode. Chaotic and fun with more players on the field.
